actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT id,invoice_number, trip_counts, trip_total_revenue,client_name, trip_month,
created_at, vat, ait, banner, status,collectable as net_to_redx, total_price_after_vat_ait, shop_id,
received_amount, hard_copy_receiving_date, received_vat_amount, received_ait_amount,received_amount_wo_vat_ait,due_amount

FROM finance_trip_invoices where shop_id={{search_shop_id.selectedOptionValue}}
--and received_amount != 0
and status not in ('receiving-complete','Invalid','Ready-to-send') 
		 --or total_price_after_vat_ait-received_amount >=0)
--and id in (2885,3137)
